justification: Leadership - Demonstrated leadership skills through roles in managing and strategizing marketing campaigns, however not specific to large teams.
Experience - Has comprehensive experience in marketing, but lacks direct SEO strategy development which is crucial for this role.
SEO Strategy Development - Exhibits understanding of SEO through traffic analysis but lacks in direct strategy development and execution roles.
Client Engagement - Has extensive experience with client engagement through business development roles, beneficial for this job's client-focused needs.
Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills - Has evident strategic thinking through marketing and lead generation methods in past roles.

requirements.criteria: Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills

input.job_description:
## Job Title: Sales and SEO Management Specialist  

### Location: Lahore, Pakistan  

### Company: Innovate Digital Solutions Inc.  

### Job Summary:  
Join Innovate Digital Solutions Inc. as a Sales and SEO Management Specialist. You will be part of a dynamic team responsible for driving client engagement and ensuring optimal performance in digital marketing strategies. Your role will include managing client relationships, improving SEO strategies, and leading your team to achieve sales targets.  

### Key Responsibilities:  
- Proactively engage with prospective clients to understand their business needs and provide innovative solutions.  
- Design and execute SEO strategies in alignment with client’s marketing objectives.  
- Manage and optimize PPC campaigns to maximize ROI and brand visibility.  
- Develop and maintain strong client relationships through tailored marketing solutions.  
- Lead a team to achieve and surpass sales targets while providing exceptional customer service.  
- Analyze market trends and algorithms to tailor SEO strategies accordingly.  
- Produce reports that track progress and measure success against KPIs.  

### Ideal Candidate Profile:  
You are a skilled sales and marketing professional with strong analytical skills suited to identifying and executing SEO opportunities. You excel at client interactions, possessing the ability to transform potential leads into satisfied clients through strategic and well-executed marketing initiatives. Leadership and team management skills will be pivotal to drive sales and motivate your team.  

### Benefits:  
- Competitive salary package  
- Health and wellness benefits  
- Performance bonuses  
- Opportunities for career advancement  

Join us to redefine digital engagement and lead market strategies with agility and innovation.
input.additional_info: Innovate Digital Solutions Inc. prefers candidates from reputable institutions such as [University of Lahore], [Punjab University]. Remote work options are available subject to roles and responsibilities. We assess skills through a combination of technical tests, interviews, and real-world problem-solving scenarios to gauge practical competency in strategic marketing contexts.
minimum_requirements: Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills

details.name: Zaid Hameed

education.degree_title: MBA - Master of Business Administration in Marketing and Finance
BBA - Bachelor of Business Administration in Marketing and Finance

details.executive_summary: Zaid Hameed is a marketing and business development professional with extensive experience in content development, copywriting, and digital marketing strategies. He has a proven track record in customer acquisition and retention, utilizing various channels including social media and email marketing to drive business growth.

employment_history.details: Content development and implementation through channels that include social platforms, email campaigns, and the company website. Prospecting and lead generation through selected channels mainly, LinkedIn. Analyzing traffic and lead generation avenues through Google Analytics and Search Console. Research, strategize & implement marketing strategy to optimize the lead generation cycle. Ensuring a smooth and timely onboarding process while forming SOPs to ensure best practices. Discovery meeting with customers to analyze their business case and suggest the most effective solution. Demonstration of our solutions in order to train our business partners and customers. Managing the CRM for pricing and other commercial aspects including Statement of Work (SOW). Updating the official website through the Content Management System that includes basic HTML and CSS. Coordinate with the support and technical team to ensure the business need is communicated properly as well as to ensure a smooth installation process. Use customer feedback to improve solutions and keep up with the market trends. Ideate and deliver on video marketing collateral.

Prospecting and lead generation narrowed down to the market with respect to the company portfolio, managing CRM, following-up and reporting to the higher management. Coordinate with the Development Department to come up with the technical and financial proposals. Identify and segment markets to devise marketing strategies, content and offerings. Coordinating with the Research and Development team to enhance products further.

Created the social media strategy for the promotion of Punjab as a preferred investment destination. Ran ad campaigns on Facebook, LinkedIn and Google with an above average CTR and an extremely low CPC. Preparing presentations for the incoming delegations from across the globe tailored specifically to their investment needs. Conducted research on different economic sectors to identify and highlight the various investment opportunities. Conducted business development activities for the Pak – Iran Fair at the Expo Center.
